binding:binding.name: Paxton Net2
binding:binding.description: This binding provides integration with Paxton Net2 Access Control systems. It enables remote door control, real-time status monitoring, and user management through openHAB. Features include door unlock/lock control, live status updates via SignalR, user creation/deletion with access level assignment, and automatic discovery of connected doors.
binding:binding.author: Nanna Agesen (@Prinsessen)

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Net2 Server Hostname
parameter.description: The hostname or IP address of your Paxton Net2 server

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: API Operator Username
parameter.description: Net2 operator username in format: FirstName LastName

parameter.name: clientId
parameter.label: API Client ID
parameter.description: Net2 API license Client ID (from license file)

parameter.name: tlsVerification
parameter.label: TLS Verification
parameter.description: Enable TLS certificate verification (recommended for production)

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval (seconds)
parameter.description: Polling interval for door status updates (10-3600 seconds)
